title: Stuffed Ridge Gourd/ Oppu Beerakaya Curry
content:
Ingredients: Ridge gourd - 1 Fresh grated coconut - 1 cup Onion - 1 cup (chopped) Dry Red chillies - 4 Red chili powder - 1 Tb sp Coriander seeds - 1 tea spoon Cumin / Jeera - 1 tea spoon Garlic - 3 cloves Tamarind paste - 1 tea spoon Jaggery - one small piece Coriander - 1 cup Salt - As per taste For Tempering/ Tadka/ Popu: Mustard seeds/ Avvalu - 1/4 tea spoon Cumin seeds/ Jeera - 1/2 tea spoon Urad dal/ Minapappu - 1/4 tea spoon Bengal gram/ Senagapappu - 1/4 tea spoon Curry leaves - 4 to 5 Oil - 1 tb sp Procedure:
  • Wash Ridge gourd and peel off. Cut Ridge gourd into medium round shape then make cross cut like X on them. Keep them aside
  • Add coconut powder, dry red chillies, red chili powder, jeera, coriander seeds, jaggery, garlic, Salt in mixer grinder until smooth paste. Keep it aside
  • Now add onion in mixer grinder form coarse paste. Take out onion paste
  • Mix coconut paste and onion paste in a bowl
  • Stuff this masala paste in Ridge gourd and arrange in a plate
  • Add Tempering/ Tadka/ popu on top of the Ridge gourd pieces
  • Garnish with coriander and steam for about 15 to 20 mins
  • Serve it with Red gram /dal/ kandi pappu, rice and ghee
